name: trustpilot-review
author: ZIPender
description: Trustpilot TrustBox widget for PteroCA. Displays your Trustpilot reviews and score on the user dashboard using the free official TrustBox embed.

enabled.label: Enable Plugin
enabled.help: Enable or disable the Trustpilot plugin globally

test_mode.label: Test Mode
test_mode.help: Shows a TEST MODE badge on the widget. Disable in production!

business_unit_id.label: Business Unit ID
business_unit_id.help: Required. This is a hex ID (e.g. 697291b372b660659ede4d52), NOT your domain. Find it: go to trustpilot.com/review/YOURDOMAIN, view page source, search for 'businessUnitId'

review_url.label: Trustpilot Review URL
review_url.help: Use the /evaluate/ link (not /review/) so reviews are properly tracked. Example: https://www.trustpilot.com/evaluate/hosting.ezha.fr

enable_widget.label: Enable Dashboard Widget
enable_widget.help: Show the Trustpilot widget on the user dashboard

popup_title_en.label: Widget Title (English)
popup_title_en.help: Title shown in the widget header for English users

popup_title_fr.label: Widget Title (French)
popup_title_fr.help: Title shown in the widget header for French users

popup_message_en.default: If you've enjoyed our service, we'd love to hear your feedback on Trustpilot!
popup_message_en.label: Widget Message (English)
popup_message_en.help: Message shown below the TrustBox widget for English users

popup_message_fr.default: Si vous avez apprécié notre service, nous serions ravis d'avoir votre avis sur Trustpilot !
popup_message_fr.label: Widget Message (French)
popup_message_fr.help: Message shown below the TrustBox widget for French users

show_leave_review_button.label: Show 'Leave a Review' Button
show_leave_review_button.help: Show a button linking to your Trustpilot page in the widget footer

trustbox_stars.label: TrustBox Star Filter
trustbox_stars.help: Which star ratings to display (e.g. '4,5' = only 4 and 5 stars, '1,2,3,4,5' = all)

trustbox_locale.label: TrustBox Language
trustbox_locale.help: Language of the TrustBox widget (e.g. en-US, fr-FR, de-DE)
